items.sentence: There was a lot of tension between Tom and Mary.
Tom asked me when I would be going to Australia.
Tom asked me where I had bought my hiking boots.
Tom asked me whether he should help Mary or not.
Tom became the acting chairman of the committee.
Tom began to learn French about three years ago.
Tom believes he has a very low carbon footprint.
If you don\'t want to do it, you don\'t have to.
If you don\'t want to do it, you don\'t need to.
Tom wasn\'t about to leave Mary alone with John.
